goal.ch:
讓學生對唐宋之間的轉變有一個大略的了解，並對明清史中的重大時間和課題有所掌握。
本課程綜合了中外學者的研究成果，希望藉此讓學生對中國史有一個不同的視野。
goal.en:
This course will give a brief introduction to the major transformantion of Chinese history from Tang to Song dynasties. I will then focus on the major events and topics of Ming-Qing history.

Since this course synthesizes the major works by Chinese and Western scholars, it will bring students a new perspetive of Chinese history.

outline.ch:
1.唐宋變遷
2.大明王朝
3.清帝國
4.明清社會史論
5.晚明商品經濟的發展與社會風氣的變遷
6.晚明的個性解放
7.商人文化與社會：以徽商為例
8.明清士大夫的日常生活與宗教
9.大眾文化:宗教與情欲
10.回憶中的城市──南京
11.中國的戲曲演出——明清到20世紀
outline.en:
1.Transformation from Tang to Song dynasties
2.Ming dynasty
3.Qing dynasty
4.Introduction to the social history of Ming and Qing
5.Development of commercial economy in late Ming and the changes of social customs
6.Liberation of personality in late Ming
7.Commercial cultural and society
8.Everyday life and religion of gentry-literati of Ming-Qing
9.Popular culture: religion and desire
10.City in remembrance: late Ming Nanjing
11.Theatrical performances: from Ming-Qing to modern China
